channel.title: Crowdfunding Collection #191, including every tabletop rpg project started between 02/06 and 02/13
channel.description: I present to you the new Crowdfunding Collection #191, including every tabletop rpg project started between 02/06 and 02/13. This time without the thumbnails, mostly because I lack the energy but wanted to get the collection out before all the 7-day projects expire. You find more zines at the ZIMO page. English Crowdfundings 2 Roleplaying Games 2 Superhero Roleplaying Games 5 Solo Roleplaying Games 2 Two Player Roleplaying Games 3 Zine Roleplaying Games 5 Zine Fantasy Roleplaying Games 5 Settings 4 Sourcebooks 2 D&D 5E Sourcebooks 4 Adventures 3 OSR/SE Adventures 3 Dice Projects 1 Coin Project 2 Deck of Cards 1 Enamel Pin 4 Various RPG Projects Spanish Crowdfundings 1 Adventures 1 App French Crowdfundings 2 Roleplaying Games 2 Sourcebooks Article: https://teylen.blog/2022/02/13/crowdfunding-collection-191/

item.title: Crowdfunding Collection #191, including every tabletop rpg project started between 02/06 and 02/13
item.dc:creator: @Teylen
item.description:
@Teylen wrote:

I present to you the new Crowdfunding Collection #191, including every tabletop rpg project started between 02/06 and 02/13.

This time without the thumbnails, mostly because I lack the energy but wanted to get the collection out before all the 7-day projects expire. You find more zines at the ZIMO page.

English Crowdfundings

2 Roleplaying Games
2 Superhero Roleplaying Games
5 Solo Roleplaying Games
2 Two Player Roleplaying Games
3 Zine Roleplaying Games
5 Zine Fantasy Roleplaying Games
5 Settings
4 Sourcebooks
2 D&D 5E Sourcebooks
4 Adventures
3 OSR/SE Adventures
3 Dice Projects
1 Coin Project
2 Deck of Cards
1 Enamel Pin
4 Various RPG Projects

Spanish Crowdfundings

1 Adventures
1 App

French Crowdfundings

2 Roleplaying Games
2 Sourcebooks

Article: https://teylen.blog/2022/02/13/crowdfunding-collection-191/

Read full topic
